headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  STERNLIEB, JEAN RUTH

lead_paragraph: STERNLIEB--Jean Ruth, died February 11 at 89 years old. She is survived by her three children, their husbands, three grandchildren and nieces and nephews. Jean was a huge supporter of Hadassah and a role model to many. Jean had many friends and will be greatly missed in her community. In lieu of flowers, contributions can be made to Hadassah of Greater Miami.
